content: I'm excited to read about [Manton Reece](http://www.manton.org/)'s upcoming microblog platform, especially as he seems keen to [support Micropub and Webmention](http://www.manton.org/2016/01/micropub-and-the-quiet-indiewebcamp-revolution.html).
summary: I'm excited to read about @manton2's upcoming microblog platform, especially if it supports Micropub and Webmention: http://www.manton.org/2016/01/micropub-and-the-quiet-indiewebcamp-revolution.html
